nodes.text: Kloon was a pirate and commentator on Gundark's Gear Datalog during the early years of the New Republic. On the entry for the PCW-880 fusioncutter, Kloon warned other subscribers that Ororo Transportation was coating their airlocks with a heat-sensitive contact explosive. The result being that when a fusioncutter was used on them, it ignited a plasma flame that incinerated anything inside ten meters.
